part2data.headline: Xi, Kim hold talks, reaching important consensus
part2data.text: The two leaders of China and DPRK had an in-depth exchange of views on bilateral relations and issues of common concern, and reached important consensus....The two leaders of China and DPRK had an in-depth exchange of views on bilateral relations and issues of common concern, and reached important consensus....
